data.question:
What is the conservation status of the species shown in the image, according to IUCN Red List in 2020?
 A: Critically Endangered B: Endangered C: Extinct D: Lower Risk/least concern
Please answer the question by responsing with the option key (e.g., 'A', 'B', etc.). Please do not include any other text. If there are multiple answer, seperate them by comma, like 'A,B'.
data.sources: BioTroves: https://github.com/baskargroup/BioTrove, IUCN Red List: https://www.iucnredlist.org/
data.question_raw: What is the conservation status of the species shown in the image, according to IUCN Red List in 2020?
data.question_rule: Please answer the question by responsing with the option key (e.g., 'A', 'B', etc.). Please do not include any other text. If there are multiple answer, seperate them by comma, like 'A,B'.

data.question: Summarize the information of the species shown at first row, first column. You only need to summarize the information in `ID` only. Please output the text only without additional infomration.
data.sources: Reef Fish Identification Tropical Pacific Page 239

answers.answer: Bright red with clearish to reddish fins
small scales compared to other soldierfishes
no dark margin on rear gill cover or white margins on fins

data.question_raw: Summarize the information of the species shown at first row, first column.
data.question_rule: You only need to summarize the information in `ID` only. Please output the text only without additional infomration.

data.question:
Based on the descrption below, locate the target object in the image by providing a bounding box. The description is as follows:

```
titan triggerfish
```

Please provide the bounding boxes of all targets in the format:
        ```json
        {
            "bboxes": [
                [x_topleft, y_topleft, width, height],
  [x_topleft, y_topleft, width, height]
              ...
            ],
        }
        ```
        where `bboxes` is a list of bounding boxes in the format [x_topleft, y_topleft, width, height], which is coco format. You may normalize the value.
        Please output the answer in JSON format without any additional text.
